body: I looked around and `raw_resize_` is the only function that can change the size of the sparse tensor (`_sizes_mut` exposes the underlying `size_` vector in a mutable way, but its usage is very limited).
body_html: I looked around and raw_resize_ is the only function that can change the size of the sparse tensor (_sizes_mut exposes the underlying size_ vector in a mutable way, but its usage is very limited).
body_text: I looked around and raw_resize_ is the only function that can change the size of the sparse tensor (_sizes_mut exposes the underlying size_ vector in a mutable way, but its usage is very limited).
